FlipCoinPage.html_description: Do you need to make a decision? Flip a coin online. Head or tails, let the luck decide.
FlipCoinPage.html_keywords: flip a coin, heads or tails, luck, decide, yes, no 50 percent, virtual coin, flip online
FlipCoinPage.learn_more_content: Coin flipping, coin tossing, or heads or tails is the practice of throwing a coin in the air and checking which side is showing when it lands, in order to choose between two alternatives. It is a form of sortition which inherently has two possible outcomes. The party who calls the side wins.
FlipCoinPage.touch_to_toss: Touch the coin to make it spin

GroupsGenerator.certified_draw_description: If you want to make a public raffle to ensure an impartial result you should create a public raffle.
GroupsGenerator.error_form_not_enough_participants: There are not enough participants to make {{numberOfGroups}} groups
GroupsGenerator.field_label_when_to_toss: Choose when to publish the results
GroupsGenerator.html_description: Create teams online. Split a group of people into smaller groups. Pair people from a group.
GroupsGenerator.html_keywords: random groups, random teams, make teams, raffle, match, pairs, couples, trios, match people
GroupsGenerator.share_result_dialog_body:
If you want to ensure that the groups were created fair and randomly you need to create them publicly.
You will be able to schedule when the results will be made public and share a link with the participants so they can see the results live.
GroupsGenerator.share_result_dialog_title: Generate the groups publicly to share the results
GroupsGenerator.step_label_when_to_toss: When will the results be published?

HomePage.html_description: Create online raffles, flip a coin, make teams... Take any decision randomly

Raffle.draw_subheading: Create an online raffle with prizes and share the results.
Raffle.error_form_not_enough_participants: There are {{numberOfPrizes}} prizes but only {{count}} participant. Add more participants
Raffle.error_form_not_enough_participants_plura: There are {{numberOfPrizes}} prizes but only {{count}} participants. Add more participants

Raffle.learn_more_content: With this raffle you will be able to choose a list of participants and decide when the results will be published

Raffle.page_title: Raffle with a closed list of participants

RandomNumber.draw_subheading: Simple random number generator. Simply choose the range and the amount of numbers to generate.
RandomNumber.error_field_message_min_results: You must generate at least one number
RandomNumber.error_form_invalid_ranges: The chosen range (numbers between {{min}} and {{max}}) is not valid
RandomNumber.error_form_range_not_big_enough: The range is not big enough
RandomNumber.html_description: Generate random numbers between two numbers, with or without repetitions. ChooseRandom's random number generator is quick and simple.

RecentDrawsPage.delete_all_recent_draws_modal_content: Raffles are only removed from your history, participants will still be able to access them if they have the link.
RecentDrawsPage.delete_all_recent_draws_modal_title: Do you want to clear your history of raffles?
RecentDrawsPage.delete_recent_draw_modal_content: This raffle will only be removed from your history of recent raffles, participants who have the link will still be able to access it.

SpinArrow.html_description: Do you need to decide who wil be the chosen one? Spin an arrow online
SpinArrow.html_keywords: spin arrow online, spinner, game, choose randomly
SpinArrow.learn_more_title: What can an arrow be used for?
SpinArrow.learn_more_content: This arrow works best in mobile devices. Place it in the middle of a group, touch it to make it spin and the pointed person will be the winner. You can also use it as a random compass when you need to know where to go
SpinArrow.touch_to_toss: Hit the arrow to make it spin
